title: 3 losses today
body:
First loss: 2 afk
Second loss: 1 feeder vaynespotting (Google it if you dont understand) + they have smurf
Third loss: 1 afk

This elo is fun

[#ventingRage]

I think I need some moral encouragement. Anyone?

replies.body:
Hey there,

This board is for help & support regarding technical issues with the game, if you wish to vent somewhere I would recommend [Misc](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous) or [GD](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion).
